explains: vt. 用半圆凿子挖；欺骗
wordGroup: fault gouge 断层泥；断层破碎物；耳巴泥

sentences.en: He has accused her of threatening to gouge his eyes out.
sentences.cn: 他控告她威胁要挖出他的眼睛。

sentences.en: In the Middle Ages, a favourite punishment was to gouge out a prisoner's eyes.
sentences.cn: 在中世纪，最受欢迎的惩罚是剜出囚犯的眼睛。

sentences.en: You can blind or gouge him if you anticipate the third seduce.
sentences.cn: 如果你预料他会使用第三次的引诱，你可以至盲或者凿击他。
